artist: Artist: Pat Hui; Author: Nalan Singde
creditline: Gift of funds from Virginia Kremen in memory of Dr. Arnold Kremen
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two images with Chinese text on small left image and English translation at right; horizontal bands of color with small white areas--yellow, brown, black, green, purple
dimension:
14 x 8 13/16 in. (35.56 x 22.38 cm) (image, left image)
14 x 19 5/16 in. (35.56 x 49.05 cm) (image, right image)
20 x 39 15/16 in. (50.8 x 101.44 cm) (mount)
medium: Watercolor and metallic ink pen on paper
title: Attempting to look into the shady mountains, from a set of 24 poems
